nodes.text: Tooltip is text description related to particular UI element. Tooltip appears near "hovered" or "focused" element depending on configuration. Open by clicking is allowed only for mobile interface. Tooltip doesn't support complex text, tables and interactions (link is exceptional case).

: Make sure your target component (e.g. Button) works correctly with refs. This is vital, since the Tooltip component exposes its first child ref, so if you don't provide a ref to a DOM element of your target component, the Tooltip will not be able to work as expected.
